name: Hephaestus
printed_effect:
When you Cast this Hephaestus you can
Enchant up to {fire}{fire}{fire} to it. You can
Disenchant {fire} from this Hephaestus in
order to Search your deck for an
Artifact and add it to your hand.
effect: When you Cast this Hephaestus you can Enchant up to {fire}{fire}{fire} to it. You can Disenchant {fire} from this Hephaestus in order to Search your deck for an Artifact Rune and add it to your hand.
